name: ESCAPE THE SHIP!
description:
This is my first project after many years of dreaming of making my own games.  I used this game as a way to learn the Unity development environment and video game development processes.  It is extremely simple but it's taught me the basics to take onto my next game.  Maybe next time I will add some sound and more than one button.

Can you help the little robot jump the platforms and escape the ship?  Press spacebar to jump the 25 platforms and complete the game.  It will take you more time to download and launch the game than it will to complete.
